description: A more experimental take on rap, often characterised by genre-blending, unique production and alternative arrangements.
title: Alt. Rap

description: Spanning Algerian Rai, Egyptian Tarab, Palestinian Rap and the emerging electronic scene, the MENA region represents a cultural crossroads where tradition and innovation meet.
short_description: The full spectrum of sounds from Rabat to Tehran.
title: Middle East & North Africa

description: Originating in the London club scene of the mid-'80s, acid jazz offers a soulful, funk and disco-infused take on classic jazz tropes and progressions.
short_description: Soul, funk and disco-infused take on classic jazz
title: Acid Jazz

description: Emerging from the Arabic diaspora in France in the 90s & influenced by US hip hop beats, a young, talented and committed scene has sprung up across Egypt, Palestine and Iraq.
short_description: The beats you'd expect, from places you wouldn't.
title: Arabic Hip Hop

description: A form of dance music that adds influences from funk and hip hop to heavy basslines and broken beats. Created out of crate-digger culture, with a focus on forgotten and rare gems.
short_description: Dance rhythms with funk and hip hop influences
title: Electro
